about_the_game:
The Shield Lancer

The Shield Lancer brings honor and justice back to the fallen kingdom of Tarethiel. This noble and humble warrior will decimate foes with fearless lunging attacks while protecting those in need. A true juggernaut, he excels at reflecting enemy attacks back upon themselves.

Playstyle:

The Shield Lancer fearlessly charges into battle, relying on his exceptional defensive abilities to sustain engagements until victory is secured. This juggernaut absorbs blows meant for others, turning enemy strikes into opportunities to deal punishing damage. By blocking and executing powerful counterattacks, he establishes dominance and holds his ground against any adversary.

Recommended for:

  • Players who enjoy diving headfirst into any situation with strong defenses.

  • Those seeking fast area-of-effect clear potential while maintaining a defensive stance.

  • Believers in karma, with a penchant for powerful counterattacks.

Stand your ground!
